articles.title: King Charles visits Germany in first overseas trip as monarch - Reuters UK
articles.description: King Charles was greeted with military honours at the Brandenburg Gate in Berlin on Wednesday as he began his first state visit abroad since becoming the British monarch, part of efforts to re-set relations with Europe post-Brexit.
articles.content: BERLIN, March 29 (Reuters) - King Charles was greeted with military honours at the Brandenburg Gate in Berlin on Wednesday as he began his first state visit abroad since becoming the British monarch,… [+3637 chars]

articles.author: Jenni Reid, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets head for a broadly higher open, but doubts linger over banking sector - CNBC
articles.description: European markets are higher on Wednesday, but recent news will keep investors' nerves on edge.
articles.content:
European stock markets were higher on Wednesday, as investor doubts over the health of the banking sector continued to wane.
